mapper.sql: class_id, class_name, student_count, state, responsible, telephone, is_delete, create_by, create_at, institutions_id, start_time, end_time, hangye_type, work_type, training_mode, fee, is_subsidy, subsidy_number, training_type, certificate, training_level, perfection_standard, employment_intention, training_pos
mapper.select:
select t_class.class_id,t_class.class_name,t_class.student_count,t_class.responsible,t_class.telephone,t_institutions.institutions_name,t_class.state,t_class.start_time,t_class.end_time from t_class_institutions LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_class.class_id = t_class_institutions.class_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions on t_class_institutions.institutions_id = t_institutions.institutions_id where t_class.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0 and t_class.state >= #{state}
limit #{length} offset #{start}

select t_class.class_id,t_class.class_name,t_class.student_count,t_class.responsible,t_class.telephone,t_institutions.institutions_name,t_class.state,t_class.start_time,t_class.end_time from t_class_institutions LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_class.class_id = t_class_institutions.class_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions on t_class_institutions.institutions_id = t_institutions.institutions_id where t_class.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0 and t_class_institutions.institutions_id = #{id}
limit #{length} offset #{start}

select t_class.class_id,t_class.class_name from t_class_institutions LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_class.class_id = t_class_institutions.class_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions on t_class_institutions.institutions_id = t_institutions.institutions_id where t_class.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0 and t_class_institutions.institutions_id = #{id}

select count(*) from t_class_institutions LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_class.class_id = t_class_institutions.class_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions on t_class_institutions.institutions_id = t_institutions.institutions_id where t_class.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0

select count(*) from t_class_institutions LEFT JOIN t_class ON t_class.class_id = t_class_institutions.class_id LEFT JOIN t_institutions on t_class_institutions.institutions_id = t_institutions.institutions_id where t_class.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.is_delete = 0 and t_institutions.institutions_name like #{search}
mapper.insert: insert into t_class (class_id, class_name, student_count, state, responsible, telephone, is_delete, create_by, create_at, institutions_id, start_time, end_time, hangye_type, work_type, training_mode, fee, is_subsidy, subsidy_number, training_type, certificate, training_level, perfection_standard, employment_intention, training_pos) values (#{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{institutionsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{hangyeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSubsidy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subsidyNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trainingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perfectionStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employmentIntention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update t_class
class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
student_count = #{studentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
responsible = #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
institutions_id = #{institutionsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
hangye_type = #{hangyeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
training_mode = #{trainingMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_subsidy = #{isSubsidy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subsidy_number = #{subsidyNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
training_type = #{trainingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

training_level = #{trainingLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perfection_standard = #{perfectionStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employment_intention = #{employmentIntention,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
training_pos = #{trainingPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_class set class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_count = #{studentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, responsible = #{responsible,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, institutions_id = #{institutionsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, hangye_type = #{hangyeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, training_mode = #{trainingMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_subsidy = #{isSubsidy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subsidy_number = #{subsidyNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, training_type = #{trainingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate = #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, training_level = #{trainingLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perfection_standard = #{perfectionStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employment_intention = #{employmentIntention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, training_pos = #{trainingPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
